channel.title: Twitter / BuddhaQuotes
channel.description: Twitter updates from Buddhist Quotes / BuddhaQuotes.

item.title: BuddhaQuotes: Delight in bodily forms, feelings, perceptions, mental formations or consciousness, then delight in suffering.
item.description: BuddhaQuotes: Delight in bodily forms, feelings, perceptions, mental formations or consciousness, then delight in suffering.

item.title: BuddhaQuotes: Decay, disease, death, sorrow, pain, and despair cannot be avoided by mere desiring -- and not to get what one desires is suffering.
item.description: BuddhaQuotes: Decay, disease, death, sorrow, pain, and despair cannot be avoided by mere desiring -- and not to get what one desires is suffering.
